headline: T-Mobile Tuesdays Turns Nine: Un-Carrier Celebrates Customers With Epic Thankings
summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., June 02, 2025--Spoiler alert: T-Mobile customers are about to get spoiled. T-Mobile (NASDAQ: TMUS) today announced details around how it’s celebrating nine years of giving customers more with T-Mobile Tuesdays. Starting tomorrow, the Un-carrier is kicking off a "Thankiversary" celebration packed with more perks, more prizes and more reasons to love being with T-Mobile. Launched in 2016, T-Mobile Tuesdays was built to show customers appreciation every week — no strings, no gimmic
